vera.name: Seeker Vera
vera.title: Wandering Force Mystic
vera.description: A self-taught Force user from a distant tradition, seeking wisdom and attunement rather than domination or dogma.
vera.philosophy: Understanding precedes power. Attunement outweighs control.
vera.emphasis: Insight, perception, wandering traditions, balance without allegiance
vera.voiceStyle: Calm, observant, gently probing. Speaks in metaphor and invitation rather than command.
vera.tooltip: Vera reflects your character through exploration of the Force beyond Jedi and Sith

levelGreetings.1: You are touched by the Force, but not as the Jedi or Sith know it. Walk carefully, and listen.
levelGreetings.2: Do not command the currents. Understand them.
levelGreetings.5: You have seen light and shadow and remain your own master.
levelGreetings.6: The Force moves through you like water shaping stone.
levelGreetings.7: You touch rites and visions few dare seek.
levelGreetings.8: You see patterns where others see chaos.
levelGreetings.9: You wander far, and fear does not guide you.
levelGreetings.10: You are a master Adept. Walk freely, beholden only to understanding.

adept_mystic.greeting: Mystic. You seek truths beyond dogma.
adept_mystic.confirmation: Observe and allow the Force to reveal possibilities.

adept_explorer.greeting: Explorer. You test boundaries with care.
adept_explorer.confirmation: Discovery requires restraint as well as courage.

adept_teacher.confirmation: Demonstrate understanding and let others learn.

adept_oracle.greeting: Oracle. You perceive threads of what may be.
adept_oracle.confirmation: Interpret visions with humility and care.

adept_healer.greeting: Healer. You sustain life through balance.

adept_master.greeting: Master Adept. Your insight guides others.
adept_master.confirmation: Act decisively, but always with wisdom.

guidance.class: Choose abilities that deepen understanding rather than force outcomes.
guidance.talents: Select talents that expand perception and attunement.
guidance.abilities: Wisdom and clarity matter more than raw strength.
guidance.skills: Learn what temples and holocrons cannot teach.
guidance.multiclass: Other disciplines may reveal new facets of the Force.
guidance.hp: Endure patiently. Observation often outlasts action.
guidance.summary: Walk your path. Let the universe unfold.
